act:
618097 THE RICE- MILLING INDUSTRY (REGULATION) REPEAL ACT, 1997
ACT NO. 28 OF 1997 [ 28th May, 1997.]
X An Act to repeal the Rice- Milling Industry (Regulation) Act, 1958.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Forty- eighth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
558899 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Rice- Milling Industry (Regulation) Repeal Act, 1997.
1812474 2Repeal of Act 21 of 1958.- The Rice- Milling Industry (Regulation) Act, 1958 is hereby repealed.
